reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan well-designed and appreciate its lightweight, medium-weight fabric that's perfect for layering.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: Best purchase ever! Love the scallop detail, fits, comfortable, stylish, and a bargain! You can’t go wrong:) I ordered white, but will ordering more colors asap. Lightweight and so very versatile! Read more
items.author: Mary S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty scallop, nice material and colors
items.body: I wear cardigans at the office because sometimes it’s cool enough and they’re professional enough for work. These cardigans are true to color as advertised and the scalloped edge is unique! They are soft and a little stretchy but don’t sag. Most of the wrinkles came out when I hung the sweater but the heavier wrinkles came out with a little steam. I’m 5’ 6” and wear large or extra large tops, I don’t like them to be tight when I’m using the keyboard and mouse and I want some coverage for my bust. I ordered these in XL and will not switch to large because I can wear a long sleeved top under the XL if I want to. Read more
items.author: Lorraine S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, Very pretty
items.body: Lovely sweater. Quality material without being too heavy. Great for layering. I ordered a size larger than normal to make sure it wouldn’t gap when buttoned. It fits great! Read more
items.author: M. Hartman

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: This sweater is very nice. It’s a good fit overall, not baggy. Looks professional. I just wish the sleeves were a little longer. Read more
items.author: JoanMarie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutest sweater I ever bought!
items.body: Perfect fit, the sweater is so cute with the scallops making it great for dressing up or casual. The texture is soft and the right thickness for wearing under your coat on a cold day and not overheating. Just wire it to church with my wool coat on a very cold overcast day and I always overheat and it was very breathable. It made a one of the best sweaters purchase I’ve ever made. I really feel it’s going to hold up better than any of the expensive sweaters I’ve gotten at major stores. You get help by the way it was mean even when I go to wash it I think it’s going to hold it shape. Read more
items.author: Elaine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars sweet soft sweater
items.body: I love how soft and lightweight this sweater is. I'll be able to wear it through all seasons. And the added scallop detail is just sweet and feminine without being too much. Fit it true to size as well. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Essential cardigan
items.body: My new go-to sweater. Fits perfectly, coverage is good, and love the scalloped details. It’s a perfect cardigan for everyday use. The weight of the material is perfect. I ordered black and it was a steal. I will purchase other colors. This would be a great gift for any lady in your life. Read more
items.author: PBrown

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: I love this cardigan! It’s super cute and warm, looks just like the pictures as well! It’s also washer and dryer friendly and wrinkle resistant! Fabric is stretchy, good quality, and comfortable (not itchy at all). I am 5’5” in height and weight 150lbs and a size Large fit me perfectly! Read more
items.author: Patricia G. Trujillo

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Striped Black White, Turquoise Green, Apricot, Purple Red, Army Green, Coffee, Dark Gray, Raspberry Red, Red White Striped, Pumpkin Orange, Black White Striped, Red Plaid, Royal Blue, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
